projects.name: Password Generator
projects.description: My first project. Everyone must start somewhere right?! I created a basic password generator.

projects.name: Budget Breaker
projects.description: My first group project, I worked with two other people with at a coding bootcamp. This gave me collobarative skills in a development enviornment for the first time.

projects.name: Love Compatibility
projects.description: My first attempt at using an API. This was also my first custom cursor and first push to github with a personal project.

projects.name: First Virtual Enviornment
projects.description: This works on mobile and web. I STILL love this project! My first attempt at creating a virtual enviornment using a language called A-Frame.

projects.name: First Custom Deployment
projects.description: Fun fact, it took me more than 40 attempts and 2 weeks to publish my custom portfolio through github pages. I am proud of myself that I never gave up!

projects.name: Project A
projects.description: A series of images and digital art, with a poem included written by me. I did not understand dynamic sizing at the time - best viewed on web fullscreen.

projects.name: Project B
projects.description: By far my favorite of the 'Project' series. The visuals at the end inspire me to see the world differently.

projects.name: Project C
projects.description: A simple bubble that grows on scroll and appears with animation.

projects.name: Masks Poem
projects.description: An animated version of my favorite poem 'Masks' by Robert Frost. Recognized by Github. Will need to clone down to repository.

projects.name: Bubble Breaker
projects.description: Allows the user to play custom animations. Select the number of bubbles, colors, and the direction of movement.

projects.name: Functional To Do List
projects.description: Although barebones, it allows users to add, delete, and mark complete task through a task list.

projects.name: The True Policy
projects.description: A live website on custom domain that summerized political news stories around Ohio in 2023. I plan on updating this project in the near future - stay tuned!

projects.name: Custom Happy Birthday Website
projects.description: A live website deployed to a custom domain, a good friend celebrated her birthday, and I created a video and all of the graphics within 24 hours.

projects.name: My Boss is Complicated
projects.description: My boss in my first development role quickly became a mentor that I truly value and cherish. His 15+ years of development experience helped accelerate my growth as a developer. To pay him tribute, I created a website with memes to make fun of him.

projects.name: Pulse Playlist
projects.description: My most complex project to date. A live custom domain website using a custom algorithm, I use the users mood plus Spotify API history to create a custom playlist. MUST REQUEST ACCESS.
projects.language: React, Typescript, Tailwind CSS, Spotify API

projects.name: Lunaris
projects.description: MUST REQUEST ACCESS. Using firebase storage, a series of custom dashboards to determine networth based on bills, savings, bank accounts, etc.
projects.language: React, NextJS, Firebase, Typescript, Tailwind CSS

projects.name: MPSC Entertainment
projects.description: My first client under my digital website agency. The site was created by me and maintained at the beginning of 2025.
projects.language: Custom JavaScript and CSS, hosted on Squarespace
